title: Pixel 3 XL mic issue
content: Hello, I'm having a problem with my Pixel 3 XL that's becoming very frustrating. When I am on speakerphone the person on the other end hears silence or its extremely choppy. My videos around 1/2-3/4 in the sound turns to very loud static. Any help is appreciated. Thanks.
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3 XL
